slide.title: PHP 8.5: Deprecated Trait Attribute
slide.example:
<?php
class Clazz {
    #[\Deprecated("use test() instead", since: "2024-10-08")]
    function test2() {
    }
}

$c = new Clazz()->test2();
?>

div.blurb: PHP 8.5 adds support for the attributes on *traits*:
div.example:
<?php
#[\Deprecated]
trait LoggingTrait
{
    public function log(string $message) : void
    {
        // Log the message
    }
}
?>
